title: Israel ready to attack Iran's nuclear facilities, Tehran has developed a retaliatory strike and threatens to attack US bases
text:
Israel ready to attack Iran's nuclear facilities, Tehran has developed a retaliatory strike and threatens to attack US bases
Israel ready to attack Iran's nuclear facilities, Tehran has developed a retaliatory strike and threatens to attack US bases
▪️Israel has officially notified the US of its readiness to strike Iran's nuclear facilities, the media reports.
▪️Iran has developed a plan for a retaliatory strike using "hundreds of ballistic missiles" in the event of an Israeli attack - The New York Times, citing a senior Iranian official.
▪️Iran threatens to strike US bases in the region if a military conflict occurs, reports citing a statement by Iranian Defense Minister Nasirzadeh.
topics: War, Conflict and Unrest->act of terror
